CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSCs were fabricated with a structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / active layer / LiF / Al , where the polymers ( P1- P7 ) were used as electron donors and PC71BM ( or PC61BM ) was used as an electron acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| LiF |
| Al |
| PC71BM (or PC61BM) |
| Polymers (P1-P7) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| LiF |
| Al |
| PC71BM |
| PC61BM |
| Polymers (P1-P7) |

Explanation:

* ITO, PEDOT : PSS, LiF, Al, PC71BM, and PC61BM are clearly material names mentioned in the paragraph.
* Polymers (P1-P7) are also material names, as they are specifically identified as electron donors.
